plot outline: Bhadradri is the story about two brothers Raghuram (Srihari) and Chandu (Baladitya) who deal with the scam that involves health minister (Jaya Prakash Reddy), a team of corrupt doctors and the owner of the pharmaceutical company GenNext, Shankar Narayan (Mukesh Rishi). How they disclose their dirty secrets forms the crux of the story.
title: Bhadradri
plot: _Bhadradri_ (qv) is the story about two brothers Raghuram (Srihari) and Chandu (Baladitya) who deal with the scam that involves health minister (Jaya Prakash Reddy), a team of corrupt doctors and the owner of the pharmaceutical company GenNext, Shankar Narayan (Mukesh Rishi). How they disclose their dirty secrets forms the crux of the story.
